ratings.comment: The professor gave lectures with neat board-writing (using capital letters so everybody can understand easily). He wrote the lecture notes and the analysis of all the homework after classes. Also, he paid attention and patience to the office hour I attended. P.s. the textbook used in his course can be obtained online, which may save money.
Lectures can be pretty dry, but he provides a lot of supplementary materials such as lecture notes and practice exams so you can fill in the gaps easily if you dont get it in lecture

Very caring and dedicated to teaching. Probability/Stochastic Processes is his area of research, and he is an expert. Some of the proofs in class are very high level, but he tests application and understanding of the concepts and theorems. Posts detailed lecture notes, solutions to HW, and is always willing to help in office hours or on Piazza.
Very caring professor. Makes sure that everything is clear. Exam is sometimes tricky. Overall a very good professor, should choose him for your 632

Daniele was a really good teacher! He always came to class prepared and explained concepts in a way that was much easier to understand than the way the textbook presented them. He was super nice to his students, and he always tried his best to meet with them (he stayed 3 hours past his office hours to help us cram for the first midterm).
